entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then northwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
